channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Taquitos sold at Aldi stores are recalled due to metal pieces
item.description: Nearly 25,000 pounds of taquitos recalled after a consumer found metal pieces, while another reported a dental injury.

item.title: Gaza ceasefire deal being finalised, Palestinian official tells BBC
item.description: US and Israeli officials also said a deal could be finalised this week.

item.title: Video from South African mine shows desperation of illegal miners refusing to leave
item.description: The men have been underground since the police began a crackdown on illegal mining last year.

item.title: Judge clears way for partial release of special counsel's Trump report

item.title: Trump's nominees beginning Senate confirmation process
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump's Cabinet nominees are beginning to face Senate questions as their confirmation process begins. CBS News' Shawna Mizelle ...

item.title: Watch: Moment man's saved from burning LA home
item.description: Retired firefighter Rich Snyder rescued his neighbour when the LA wildfires spread to their street.

item.title: Sophisticated smuggling tunnel found between US and Mexico
item.description: The underground passage linking Ciudad Juarez with El Paso, Texas, was equipped with lighting and ventilation.

item.title: Ghana to investigate controversial $400m cathedral project
item.description: Critics say the money could be put to better use in at a time when the country is struggling economically.
